channel.title: Freeman Days teaser
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JpadN-978to&feature=player_embedded[/url]
Freeman's Days is a Russian short fan movie, that practically takes place at the Half-life 2 events. This teaser is just a small piece of a huge work the developers are menage. Official site: [url]https://freemansdays.blogspot.com/search?updated-max=2010-07-26T09%3A00%3A00%2B03%3A00&max-results=7[/url]

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: Black_Hawk
item.description:
sersoft:

the sniper says “patience, freeman”

I assume the sniper is Barney because he hasn’t gas-mask.

Edit:

-> Freeman’s Days English blog updated: https://freemansdays-eng.blogspot.com. They have answered to my request!

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Black Hawk:

Gordon escapes from Metrocops: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ILQXzGKS6Qk&feature=relmfu

Okay, I was wrong. Being a white male with glasses and a goatee does NOT always make you Gordon Freeman. :meh:

Oh well, the video was decently done, anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
The Laughing Man:

Gordon look like a painter… one of those underground hipster painter as pictured and mocked in the tv series… lol

but its cool, looking foward for this

well, both Gordon Freeman and hipster artists are modeled off of the same 1950’s squares.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Black Hawk:

I don’t know if you’re informed about these, so…

2nd Russian trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXVH1ttdtek
This time no English version.

All the speech heard in the trailer is the same as ingame. “welcome to c17” “I didn’t see you get on” “were you the only ones on the train”

the citizen says “the alarm has been on constantly for an hour, I fear this won’t end well”

the sniper says “patience, freeman”

and the text that appears during the trailer basically says: One Man, One Day, Can Change The World

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: Termo543
item.description:
Looks chill to me…I like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: Black_Hawk
item.description:
I send this message to Freeman’s Days blog:

Hello!

I know it isn’t the right place to post in English, but since the English blog isn’t updated, I don’t understand Russian and Google Translator don’t works well, I ask to developers to give me please a summary of the latest news of this project.

Thank you!

A fan of Freeman’s Days.

I hope they’ll answer soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: Shepard
item.description:
Sorry folks, almost forget about this thread Here’s a fully English teaser:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ROEpzelufLc&feature=related

Ryλn:

At 0:43, is he chewing bubblegum or is he just flexing and unflexing his jaw?

Nah, he’s just got angry because metrocop busted him

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
He was obviously landing out of a window or something and turning to blow away some metrofags.

Ninja Combine was cooler, got to admit. I hope he makes a cameo.

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Face it, that turn-around move at the end was terrible.

Apart from that it’s decent.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
I love how they kept his hair long like it kind of is in HL1.

Leather jacket is better than denim pajamas.

There’s an English version.

If you’re all going to nitpick about minor inconsistencies with the games, you should murder yourselves now.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
Power_Dust:

That’s one of the best Half-Life movies I’ve seen yet. Costumes are good, the environment is rendered very well, they made a good job merging real footage with the Half-Life 2 stuff.

#1: Escape from City 17 Part One
#2: Freeman’s Days
#3: I’m the Freeman

There are many Hl movies out there. check this one out

Shit! Double-posted!

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman Days teaser

item.description:
Lmao at old antonio banderas as the freeman. and the gun swinging. Otherwise it’s good. I’m happy that there are many half -life short movies are coming out recently.

Fucking Escape from City 17 team.
